sentences.english: The growers are busy day and night, with harvest smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 果農們日夜忙碌，臉上帶着豐收的微笑。

sentences.english: Picking up the fresh strawberries was our happy time. We were orchardists.
sentences.chinese: 採摘新鮮草莓讓小朋友們過足了一把果農癮。

sentences.english: "Zhouzhi County, Shaanxi Province, a fruit of the" rule of law over the weekend, "a reporter said.
sentences.chinese: 陝西省周至縣一位果農對《法治週末》記者說。

sentences.english: Mr. White is a successful fruit grower in this area.
sentences.chinese: 懷特先生是這個地方成功的果農。

sentences.english: Taiwan's fruit growers and aquatic products dealers can carry agricultural products with them.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣的果農和水產商可以直接帶他們的產品過來。

definition: test planting/crop grown on a trial basis
to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
our peasant friends (political term used in the early years of the Old Democratic Revolution, 1840-1919)/(Tw) (coll.) farmer
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
a rich farmer/to stress the importance of agriculture (in ancient philosophy)
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
lit. the cycle comes back to the start (idiom); to move in circles/the wheel comes full circle
